body:
@notriddle Normandy's CI doesn't do anything with filesystems, so we are likely still on AUFS. The problems AUFS pose come up for us rarely, so it hasn't been a high priority to fix. That post you linked to is talking about the Firefox build system, which is much larger than more complex that Normandy's (even though they share several properties).

In the near future, we're likely going to move the Normandy client's primary repository to mozilla-central. That would make this issue irrelevant, since we won't be running Task Cluster jobs anymore.
